languages.text: "Вы стремитесь поделить мир на части, расколоть его: на свет и тьму, ложь и истину, себя — и других. Я же вижу мир единым целым, и в этом его простота и сложность. Недостаточно просто видеть мир и слышать его голоса. Его нужно понять".

"You try to split the world into pieces, to fragment it: into light and dark, truth and lies, self and other. But I see the world as a single whole, and in this lies its simplicity and complexity. It is not enough simply to see the world and hear its voices. You must understand it."
languages.original_text: "Вы стремитесь поделить мир на части, расколоть его: на свет и тьму, ложь и истину, себя — и других. Я же вижу мир единым целым, и в этом его простота и сложность. Недостаточно просто видеть мир и слышать его голоса. Его нужно понять".

traits.locale_text: "You try to split the world into pieces, to fragment it: into light and dark, truth and lies, self and other. But I see the world as a single whole, and in this lies its simplicity and complexity. It is not enough simply to see the world and hear its voices. You must understand it."

"You try to split the world into pieces, to fragment it: into light and dark, truth and lies, self and other. But I see the world as a single whole, and in this lies its simplicity and complexity. It is not enough simply to see the world and hear its voices. You must understand it."

"You try to split the world into pieces, to fragment it: into light and dark, truth and lies, self and other. But I see the world as a single whole, and in this lies its simplicity and complexity. It is not enough simply to see the world and hear its voices. You must understand it."

"You try to split the world into pieces, to fragment it: into light and dark, truth and lies, self and other. But I see the world as a single whole, and in this lies its simplicity and complexity. It is not enough simply to see the world and hear its voices. You must understand it."

languages.text: «Tú divides el mundo en pedazos, lo fragmentas: luz y oscuridad, verdad y mentiras, lo propio y lo ajeno. Pero yo veo el mundo como un todo, y en eso radican su simplicidad y su complejidad. No basta simplemente con ver el mundo y oír sus voces. Tienes que entenderlo».
languages.original_text: "You try to split the world into pieces, to fragment it: into light and dark, truth and lies, self and other. But I see the world as a single whole, and in this lies its simplicity and complexity. It is not enough simply to see the world and hear its voices. You must understand it."

traits.locale_text: «Tú divides el mundo en pedazos, lo fragmentas: luz y oscuridad, verdad y mentiras, lo propio y lo ajeno. Pero yo veo el mundo como un todo, y en eso radican su simplicidad y su complejidad. No basta simplemente con ver el mundo y oír sus voces. Tienes que entenderlo».

languages.text: 「お前は世界を光と闇、真実と偽りといったように、細かい破片のように分けて見る傾向にある。一方で我は世界を単一的なものとして見ていて、そこに単純さと複雑さがある。世界を見て、声に耳を傾けるだけでは足りない。理解しなければならないのだ」
languages.original_text: "You try to split the world into pieces, to fragment it: into light and dark, truth and lies, self and other. But I see the world as a single whole, and in this lies its simplicity and complexity. It is not enough simply to see the world and hear its voices. You must understand it."

traits.locale_text: 「お前は世界を光と闇、真実と偽りといったように、細かい破片のように分けて見る傾向にある。一方で我は世界を単一的なものとして見ていて、そこに単純さと複雑さがある。世界を見て、声に耳を傾けるだけでは足りない。理解しなければならないのだ」

languages.text: “你们总是以割裂、细碎的目光观察世界，将它分为光明与黑暗、真实与虚假、自我与他人。但是，我会将世界看作一个整体，一个简单而又复杂的整体，仅仅用眼睛和耳朵来观察世界是不够的。你必须明白这一点。”
languages.original_text: "You try to split the world into pieces, to fragment it: into light and dark, truth and lies, self and other. But I see the world as a single whole, and in this lies its simplicity and complexity. It is not enough simply to see the world and hear its voices. You must understand it."

traits.locale_text: “你们总是以割裂、细碎的目光观察世界，将它分为光明与黑暗、真实与虚假、自我与他人。但是，我会将世界看作一个整体，一个简单而又复杂的整体，仅仅用眼睛和耳朵来观察世界是不够的。你必须明白这一点。”

languages.text: « Vous tentez de diviser le monde en fragments, de le séparer entre l'ombre et la lumière, la vérité et le mensonge, vous et lui. Moi, en revanche, je perçois le monde comme un tout, et en cela réside à la fois sa simplicité et sa complexité. Il ne suffit pas de voir le monde et d'entendre ses voix, il faut aussi le comprendre. »
languages.original_text: "You try to split the world into pieces, to fragment it: into light and dark, truth and lies, self and other. But I see the world as a single whole, and in this lies its simplicity and complexity. It is not enough simply to see the world and hear its voices. You must understand it."

traits.locale_text: « Vous tentez de diviser le monde en fragments, de le séparer entre l'ombre et la lumière, la vérité et le mensonge, vous et lui. Moi, en revanche, je perçois le monde comme un tout, et en cela réside à la fois sa simplicité et sa complexité. Il ne suffit pas de voir le monde et d'entendre ses voix, il faut aussi le comprendre. »

languages.text: "Ihr versucht, die Welt in Stücke zu zerteilen, sie zu fragmentieren: in Licht und Dunkel, Wahrheit und Lüge, selbst und andere. Doch ich sehe die Welt als ein einziges Ganzes, und darin liegt ihre Einfachheit und Komplexität. Es reicht nicht, die Welt nur zu sehen und ihre Stimmen zu hören. Man muss sie verstehen."
languages.original_text: "You try to split the world into pieces, to fragment it: into light and dark, truth and lies, self and other. But I see the world as a single whole, and in this lies its simplicity and complexity. It is not enough simply to see the world and hear its voices. You must understand it."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr versucht, die Welt in Stücke zu zerteilen, sie zu fragmentieren: in Licht und Dunkel, Wahrheit und Lüge, selbst und andere. Doch ich sehe die Welt als ein einziges Ganzes, und darin liegt ihre Einfachheit und Komplexität. Es reicht nicht, die Welt nur zu sehen und ihre Stimmen zu hören. Man muss sie verstehen."

languages.text: "Kelimeleri aydınlık ve karanlık, hakikat ve yalan, şahsi ve öteki olarak parçalara bölmeye çalışıyorsun. Ben ise kelimeyi bir bütün olarak görüyorum, böylece basitliği ve karmaşayı bir arada deneyimliyorum. Dünyayı sadece görüp duymak yeterli değildir. Onu anlamak da gerekir."
languages.original_text: "You try to split the world into pieces, to fragment it: into light and dark, truth and lies, self and other. But I see the world as a single whole, and in this lies its simplicity and complexity. It is not enough simply to see the world and hear its voices. You must understand it."

traits.locale_text: "Kelimeleri aydınlık ve karanlık, hakikat ve yalan, şahsi ve öteki olarak parçalara bölmeye çalışıyorsun. Ben ise kelimeyi bir bütün olarak görüyorum, böylece basitliği ve karmaşayı bir arada deneyimliyorum. Dünyayı sadece görüp duymak yeterli değildir. Onu anlamak da gerekir."
